channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Puppet Enterprise Pipeline
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Puppet Enterprise Pipeline

item.title: CVE-2019-10458|2024-08-04T22:24:18.522Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20puppet%20enterprise%20pipeline
item.description: Jenkins Puppet Enterprise Pipeline 1.3.1 and earlier specifies unsafe values in its custom Script Security whitelist, allowing attackers able to execute Script Security protected scripts to execute arbitrary code.
